name: clatp0cl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: eqeltrd(c1, c2, cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2), wcel(c0, ccla))
stmt.pretty: eqeltrd(c1, c2, ((glb ` c0)` c2), c0 ∈ CLat)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccla), wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2), c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CLat → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CLat → c1 =((glb ` c0)` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ CLat →((glb ` c0)` c2)∈ c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccla), wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2), c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CLat → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CLat → c1 =((glb ` c0)` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ CLat →((glb ` c0)` c2)∈ c2)

stmt.origin: p0val(c0, ccla, c1, cfv(cglb, c0), c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccla), wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cglb, c0), cfv(cglb, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cp0, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2), c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cglb, c0), cfv(cglb, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cp0, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CLat → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CLat →((glb ` c0)` c2)∈ c2)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ (glb ` c0)=(glb ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(0. ` c0)

stmt.origin: mpan2(wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2), c2), wss(c2, c2))
stmt.pretty: mpan2(c0 ∈ CLat, ((glb ` c0)` c2)∈ c2, c2 ⊆ c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2), c2))
-| wss(c2, c2)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c2, c2)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))

-| wss(c2, c2)

-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cglb, c0), cfv(cglb, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cp0, c0))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c2, c2)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cglb, c0), c2), c2))

body.origin:

-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cglb, c0), cfv(cglb, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c2 ⊆ c2)→((glb ` c0)` c2)∈ c2)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ (glb ` c0)=(glb ` c0)

cumulated.origin:

-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cp0, c0))

comment: The poset zero of a complete lattice belongs to its base. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Feb-2018.)
